Articles.Content:
Greetings,

In .19 I would often build ships which were primarily flown by a probe core with a vacant secondary attached command capsule. Since .20 The secondary command capsules I use are inhabitated by Kerbals!

This isn't a massive issue, as I can EVA the Kerbals out before the flight -- but if there any way to generate an empty capsule? Any shortcuts?

Welcome to the forums!

Unfortunately, there's none that I'm aware of, short of using a mod like the Crew Manifest mod to quickly remove crew from crewed modules on the launchpad.

Welcome to the forums!

Unfortunately, there's none that I'm aware of, short of using a mod like the Crew Manifest mod to quickly remove crew from crewed modules on the launchpad.

Crew Manifest is great and should be implemented standard in the game IMO.

Welcome to the forums!

Thankyou - long time lurker and twitch junkie. I already know some of the big cheeses around here. Figured the update chaos is a great time to jump into the fray

Unfortunately, there's none that I'm aware of, short of using a mod like the Crew Manifest mod to quickly remove crew from crewed modules on the launchpad.

That's going to be an annoying tasking, but I'm sure I'll survive.

Glad to see I'm not the only person who noticed this problem, I was planning a multi-year mission to duna last night, went to try it out today, and found kerbals invading my (supposed to be unmanned) command pods.
